entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @IsabelOakeshott #coronavirus #COVID19 #lockdown #SocialDistancing @talkRADIO @Iromg #LockdownEnd #police @metpoliceuk _ That jobsworth PC is helping the police's reputation keep sinking. Protect the at-risk and the NHS, then start easing the coronavirus lockdown, before the economy tanks.
